the ext-resources.zip file contains the resources directory of ext 4.0.7, without resources/themes/images/gray and access
the ext-lang.zip file contains the locale directory of ext 4.0.7
the ext-js.zip file contains the .js files in the root directory of ext 4.0.7

http://extjs.cachefly.net/ext-4.0.7-gpl.zip
see also http://www.sencha.com/products/js/

The resources will be extracted to delivery/webserver/OpenPetraOrg.ext/resources when running nant startWebServer.
The other files are also copied to the right places in delivery/webserver.
